price: ដើម្បីពួកគេប្រឆាំងនឹងអ្វីដែលយើងបានប្រទានឱ្យពួកគេ និងដើម្បីពួកគេសប្បាយរីករាយ។ ដូចេ្នះពួកគេគង់តែនឹងដឹង។
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum waliyatamattaʿū fasawfa yaʿlamūna
